import React, { useState } from "react" import data from "../Json/class.json" import { useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { AuthContext } from "../Context/ContextProvider" function Subjects(props) { const params = useParams() const classNote = data.find(item => item.id === params.classId) const subject = classNote["subjects"].find(item => item.id === params.subjectId) const [parma, setParma] = useState(false) return ( parma ?
parma
:

Class {params.classId}

{subject.name}

) } Subjects.contextType = AuthContext export default Subjects
